Deprecated List

File Goal.hh

the current implementation of goals is not as flexible and transparent as desired and may change drastically in the future

File Observation.hh

the current implementation of observations is not as flexible and transparent as desired and may change drastically in the future

File RStat.hh
The RStat* classes are now replaced by Boost.Chrono library.

Member TREX::agent::Clock::advanceTick (TREX::transaction::TICK &tick)
This method was used for computing extra stats. We need to find a better approach. Specifically it would be relevant to have the tick variable located on this class.

Class TREX::transaction::Observation

the current implementation of observations is not as flexible and transparent as desired and may change drastically in the future

Member TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::completedGoal (goal_id g)
This method should become useless as the goal management system is much more able to identify that a goal did complete

Member TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor::getAgentName () const

reactors are now manipulated by a graph. The agent uses this graph to trigger reactor's callbacks based on graph traversal algorithms. A graph is a more general concept thatn an agent (for example a graph could allow to have cyclic dependencies between reactors ...) to reflect this change this method has been replaced by getGraphName() and kept for backward compatibility.

Class TREX::utils::RStat
The RStat class is now replaced by Boost.Chrono library.

Class TREX::utils::RStatLap
The RStatLap class is now replaced by Boost.Chrono library.
